bibl.seg: ALSTON Richard, The City in Roman and Byzantine Egypt.
London - New York, Routledge, 2002, 8°, xvi-479 pp., tabl., figg., 4 cartes, diagrammes. ISBN 0-415-23701-7. £65.
1. Introduction. - 2. Cities and Space. - 3. Houses. - 4. Streets, Districts and Neighbourhoods. - 5. The City. - 6. The City, Region and World. - Notes. Bibliography. Index locorum. Index.

C.R. par Roger S. Bagnall, JEA 89 (2003) pp. 297-300. - James G. Keenan, BibO 60 (2003) coll. 136-141. - Neville Morley, JRS 93 (2003) p. 311. - Amphilochios Papathomas, Discussions in Egyptology 54 (2002) pp. 129-132. - Colin Adams, CR N.S., 54 (2004) pp. 514-516. - Jean A. Straus, Latomus 65 (2006) pp. 206-208. - Günter Vittmann, OLZ 99 (2004) coll. 294-298. - Alain Martin, ChrEg 82 (2007) Nos 163-164, pp. 365-366. - Jean Gascou, Topoi 15 (2007) pp. 699-702.
